description:
Kagami successfully revives Hikaru, but he lets his guard down for a second and his body is taken over by Fist, who had obtained Ordela`s powers. Hikaru rises again in order to get Kagami`s body back. Alma vs Fist... How will this battle between brothers end?
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: それでも前に進み続ける
